maya/beastmayaplugin/include/mayanodes/beastpassnode.h
/*

#ifndef BEAST_PASS_NODE_H
#define BEAST_PASS_NODE_H

#include <maya/MPxObjectSet.h>
#include <maya/MFnNumericAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MTypeId.h> 

namespace beastmaya {

class BeastPassNode : public MPxObjectSet
{
public:
        BeastPassNode();
        
        virtual ~BeastPassNode(); 

        virtual void postConstructor(); 

        static void* creator();
        
        static MStatus initialize();

        virtual MStatus compute(const MPlug& plug, MDataBlock& data);

        virtual bool canBeDeleted(bool isSrcNode);

public:
        
        static MObject targets; 
        static MObject passType; 

        // Illumination pass settings
        static MObject illuminationPassMode; 

        // Light pass settings
        static MObject lights;
        static MObject lightPassType; 

        // RNM pass settings
        static MObject rnmPassMode; 
        static MObject rnmBasis;
        static MObject rnmCustomBasisVectors;
        static MObject rnmAllowNegative;
        static MObject rnmIncludeNormalComponent;

        // AO pass settings
        static MObject aoMaxDistance;
        static MObject aoConeAngle;
        static MObject aoContrast;
        static MObject aoScale;
        static MObject aoDistribution;
        static MObject aoSelfOcclusion;

        // Lua pass settings
        static MObject luaScript;

        // The typeid is a unique 32bit indentifier that describes this node.
        // It is used to save and retrieve nodes of this type from the binary
        // file format.  If it is not unique, it will cause file IO problems.
        static  MTypeId id;
};

}

#endif // BEAST_PASS_NODE_H
